basics.name: Ala ªi Paikai
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Computational Humanities in the Department of Interdisciplinary Studies at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Summer, 2024.

interests.name: Large language model building for low-resource and endangered languages
Education, outreach, and writing on Pacific Island studies
Genealogical research in archives focusing on Pacific and Hawaiian Kingdom era history
Library and information science with a focus on archiving and digital preservation

work.summary: Processed orders and resolved technical issues within the network engineering department.
highlights: Collaborated with companies to extend service to remote areas and worked with Hawaiian communities on Molokai to bridge technological gaps and improve connectivity.
